titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Mormon Church microfilm collection, [microform]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.altformavail: Originals of most of these records available at the Bentley Historical Library.

archdesc.scopecontent: Microfilm copies of church records, census records and other records of genealogical value.
